schemes.companyDescription:
Founded in 1998, Popular Foundations Limited is a prominent player in engineering and construction services, providing comprehensive end-to-end solutions across the construction sector.

The company specializes in constructing a variety of facilities, including factories, educational institutions, and commercial and residential buildings. While it undertakes a wide range of projects, Popular Foundations Limited strategically focuses on non-residential and non-government construction projects primarily in and around Chennai. Additionally, the company has successfully completed projects in Pondicherry, Tanjore, Bangalore, Trichy, Madurai, Vizhuppuram, and Coimbatore.
